00045 #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00046 static UARTDRV_Handle_t HwFcCtsIrqGetDrvHandle(uint32_t gpioPinNo)
00047 {
00048   uint32_t i;
00049 
00050   for(i = 0; i < EMDRV_UARTDRV_MAX_DRIVER_INSTANCES; i++)
00051   {
00052     if (uartdrvHandle[i]->initData.ctsPin == gpioPinNo)
00053     {
00054       return uartdrvHandle[i];
00055     }
00056   }
00057   return NULL;
00058 }

00064 static UARTDRV_FlowControlState_t HwFcGetClearToSendPin(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00065 {
00066   return (UARTDRV_FlowControlState_t)GPIO_PinInGet(handle->initData.ctsPort, handle->initData.ctsPin);
00067 }

00070 /***************************************************************************/
00073 static void HwFcManageClearToSend(uint8_t gpioPinNo)
00074 {
00075   UARTDRV_Handle_t handle = HwFcCtsIrqGetDrvHandle(gpioPinNo);
00076 
00077   if (handle->initData.fcType == uartdrvFlowControlHw)
00078   {
00079     // If not auto mode, just assign the CTS pin state to the self state
00080     // If auto mode, also control UART TX enable
00081     handle->fcSelfState = HwFcGetClearToSendPin(handle);
00082     if (handle->fcSelfCfg == uartdrvFlowControlAuto)
00083     {
00084      if ((HwFcGetClearToSendPin(handle) == uartdrvFlowControlOn) || handle->IgnoreRestrain)
00085       {
00086         handle->IgnoreRestrain = false;
00087         handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_TXEN;
00088       }
00089       else
00090       {
00091         handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_TXDIS;
00092       }
00093     }
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 static Ecode_t FcApplyState(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00099 {
00100   uint8_t FcSwCode;
00101 
00102   if (handle->initData.fcType == uartdrvFlowControlHw)
00103   {
00104     if (handle->fcSelfCfg == uartdrvFlowControlOn)
00105     {
00106       // Assert nRTS (application control)
00107       GPIO_PinOutClear(handle->initData.rtsPort, handle->initData.rtsPin);
00108     }
00109     else if (handle->fcSelfCfg == uartdrvFlowControlOff)
00110     {
00111       // Deassert nRTS (application control)
00112       GPIO_PinOutSet(handle->initData.rtsPort, handle->initData.rtsPin);
00113     }
00114     else // Auto mode
00115     {
00116       if (handle->fcSelfState == uartdrvFlowControlOn)
00117       {
00118         // Assert nRTS
00119         GPIO_PinOutClear(handle->initData.rtsPort, handle->initData.rtsPin);
00120       }
00121       else // Off
00122       {
00123         // Deassert nRTS
00124         GPIO_PinOutSet(handle->initData.rtsPort, handle->initData.rtsPin);
00125       }
00126     }
00127   }
00128   else if (handle->initData.fcType == uartdrvFlowControlSw)
00129   {
00130     if (handle->fcSelfState == uartdrvFlowControlOn)
00131     {
00132       FcSwCode = UARTDRV_FC_SW_XON;
00133       UARTDRV_ForceTransmit(handle, &FcSwCode, 1);
00134     }
00135     else
00136     {
00137       FcSwCode = UARTDRV_FC_SW_XOFF;
00138       UARTDRV_ForceTransmit(handle, &FcSwCode, 1);
00139     }
00140   }
00141   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00142 }
00143 #endif /* EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE */
00144 
00145 
00146 /***************************************************************************/
00149 static Ecode_t EnqueueBuffer(UARTDRV_Buffer_FifoQueue_t *queue,
00150                              UARTDRV_Buffer_t *inputBuffer,
00151                              UARTDRV_Buffer_t **queueBuffer)
00152 {
00153   INT_Disable();
00154   if (queue->used >= queue->size)
00155   {
00156     *queueBuffer = NULL;
00157     INT_Enable();
00158     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_QUEUE_FULL;
00159   }
00160   memcpy((void *)&queue->fifo[queue->head], (const void *)inputBuffer, sizeof(UARTDRV_Buffer_t));
00161   *queueBuffer = &queue->fifo[queue->head];
00162   queue->head = (queue->head + 1) % queue->size;
00163   queue->used++;
00164   INT_Enable();
00165 
00166   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 /***************************************************************************/
00173 static Ecode_t DequeueBuffer(UARTDRV_Buffer_FifoQueue_t *queue,
00174                              UARTDRV_Buffer_t **buffer)
00175 {
00176   INT_Disable();
00177   if (queue->used == 0)
00178   {
00179     *buffer = NULL;
00180     INT_Enable();
00181     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_QUEUE_EMPTY;
00182   }
00183   *buffer = &queue->fifo[queue->tail];
00184   queue->tail = (queue->tail + 1) % queue->size;
00185   queue->used--;
00186   INT_Enable();
00187 
00188   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00192 /***************************************************************************/
00195 static Ecode_t GetTailBuffer(UARTDRV_Buffer_FifoQueue_t *queue,
00196                              UARTDRV_Buffer_t **buffer)
00197 {
00198   INT_Disable();
00199   if (queue->used == 0)
00200   {
00201     *buffer = NULL;
00202     INT_Enable();
00203     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_QUEUE_EMPTY;
00204   }
00205   *buffer = &queue->fifo[queue->tail];
00206 
00207   INT_Enable();
00208   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00209 }

00212 /***************************************************************************/
00215 static void EnableTransmitter(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00216 {
00217   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_TXEN;
00218   while (!(handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_TXENS));
00219   #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN )
00220   handle->initData.port->ROUTEPEN |= USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN;
00221   #else
00222   handle->initData.port->ROUTE |= USART_ROUTE_TXPEN;
00223   #endif
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 /***************************************************************************/
00230 static void DisableTransmitter(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00231 {
00232   #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN )
00233   handle->initData.port->ROUTEPEN &= ~USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN;
00234   #else
00235   handle->initData.port->ROUTE &= ~USART_ROUTE_TXPEN;
00236   #endif
00237   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_TXDIS;
00238 }
00239

00241 /***************************************************************************/
00244 static void EnableReceiver(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00245 {
00246   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_RXEN;
00247   while (!(handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXENS));
00248   #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN )
00249   handle->initData.port->ROUTEPEN |= USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN;
00250   #else
00251   handle->initData.port->ROUTE |= USART_ROUTE_RXPEN;
00252   #endif
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00256 /***************************************************************************/
00259 static void DisableReceiver(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00260 {
00261   #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN )
00262   handle->initData.port->ROUTEPEN &= ~USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN;
00263   #else
00264   handle->initData.port->ROUTE &= ~USART_ROUTE_RXPEN;
00265   #endif
00266   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_RXDIS;
00267 }

00270 /***************************************************************************/
00273 static void StartReceiveDma(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
00274                             UARTDRV_Buffer_t *buffer)
00275 {
00276   void *rxPort;
00277 
00278   handle->rxDmaActive = true;
00279   rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDATA);
00280 
00281   DMADRV_PeripheralMemory( handle->rxDmaCh,
00282                            handle->rxDmaSignal,
00283                            buffer->data,
00284                            rxPort,
00285                            true,
00286                            buffer->transferCount,
00287                            dmadrvDataSize1,
00288                            ReceiveDmaComplete,
00289                            handle );
00290 }

00293 /***************************************************************************/
00296 static void StartTransmitDma(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
00297                              UARTDRV_Buffer_t *buffer)
00298 {
00299   void *txPort;
00300 
00301   handle->txDmaActive = true;
00302   txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDATA);
00303 
00304   DMADRV_MemoryPeripheral( handle->txDmaCh,
00305                            handle->txDmaSignal,
00306                            txPort,
00307                            buffer->data,
00308                            true,
00309                            buffer->transferCount,
00310                            dmadrvDataSize1,
00311                            TransmitDmaComplete,
00312                            handle );
00313 }

00315 
00316 /***************************************************************************/
00319 static bool ReceiveDmaComplete( unsigned int channel,
00320                                 unsigned int sequenceNo,
00321                                 void *userParam )
00322 {
00323   UARTDRV_Handle_t handle;
00324   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *buffer;
00325   (void)channel;
00326   (void)sequenceNo;
00327 
00328   handle = (UARTDRV_Handle_t)userParam;
00329   GetTailBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &buffer);
00330 
00331   if (handle->initData.port->IF & USART_IF_FERR)
00332   {
00333     buffer->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_FRAME_ERROR;
00334     buffer->itemsRemaining = buffer->transferCount; // nothing received
00335     handle->initData.port->IFC = USART_IFC_FERR;
00336   }
00337   else if (handle->initData.port->IF & USART_IF_PERR)
00338   {
00339     buffer->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_PARITY_ERROR;
00340     buffer->itemsRemaining = buffer->transferCount; // nothing received
00341     handle->initData.port->IFC = USART_IFC_PERR;
00342   }
00343   else
00344   {
00345     buffer->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00346     buffer->itemsRemaining = 0;
00347   }
00348 
00349   INT_Disable();
00350 
00351   if (buffer->callback != NULL)
00352   {
00353     buffer->callback(handle, buffer->transferStatus, buffer->data, buffer->transferCount - buffer->itemsRemaining);
00354   }
00355   // Dequeue the current tail RX operation, check if more in queue
00356   DequeueBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &buffer);
00357 
00358   if (handle->rxQueue->used > 0)
00359   {
00360     GetTailBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &buffer);
00361     StartReceiveDma(handle, buffer);
00362   }
00363   else
00364   {
00365     #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00366     handle->fcSelfState = uartdrvFlowControlOff;
00367     FcApplyState(handle);
00368     #endif
00369     handle->rxDmaActive = false;
00370     DisableReceiver(handle);
00371   }
00372   INT_Enable();
00373   return true;
00374 }
00375 
00376 
00377 /***************************************************************************/
00380 static bool TransmitDmaComplete( unsigned int channel,
00381                                  unsigned int sequenceNo,
00382                                  void *userParam )
00383 {
00384   UARTDRV_Handle_t handle;
00385   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *buffer;
00386   (void)channel;
00387   (void)sequenceNo;
00388 
00389   handle = (UARTDRV_Handle_t)userParam;
00390   GetTailBuffer(handle->txQueue, &buffer);
00391 
00392   buffer->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00393   buffer->itemsRemaining = 0;
00394 
00395   INT_Disable();
00396 
00397   if (buffer->callback != NULL)
00398   {
00399     buffer->callback(handle, ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK, buffer->data, buffer->transferCount);
00400   }
00401   // Dequeue the current tail TX operation, check if more in queue
00402   DequeueBuffer(handle->txQueue, &buffer);
00403 
00404   if (handle->txQueue->used > 0)
00405   {
00406     GetTailBuffer(handle->txQueue, &buffer);
00407     StartTransmitDma(handle, buffer);
00408   }
00409   else
00410   {
00411     handle->txDmaActive = false;
00412   }
00413   INT_Enable();
00414   return true;
00415 }

00418 /***************************************************************************/
00421 static Ecode_t CheckParams(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle, void *data, uint32_t count)
00422 {
00423   if (handle == NULL)
00424   {
00425     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00426   }
00427   if ((data == NULL) || (count == 0) || (count > DMADRV_MAX_XFER_COUNT )) {
00428     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00429   }
00430   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00431 }

00434 /***************************************************************************/
00437 static Ecode_t ConfigGPIO(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle, bool enable)
00438 {
00439 #if defined( _USART_ROUTELOC0_MASK )
00440   UARTDRV_Init_t *initData;
00441 #else
00442   uint32_t location;
00443 #endif
00444 
00445 #if defined( _USART_ROUTELOC0_MASK )
00446   initData = &handle->initData;
00447 
00448   if ( 0 ) {
00449   #if defined(USARTRF0)
00450   } else if (handle->initData.port == USARTRF0) {
00451     handle->txPort = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USARTRF0_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00452     handle->rxPort = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USARTRF0_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00453     handle->txPin  = AF_USARTRF0_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00454     handle->rxPin  = AF_USARTRF0_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00455   #endif
00456   #if defined(USARTRF1)
00457   } else if (handle->initData.port == USARTRF1) {
00458     handle->txPort = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USARTRF1_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00459     handle->rxPort = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USARTRF1_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00460     handle->txPin  = AF_USARTRF1_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00461     handle->rxPin  = AF_USARTRF1_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00462   #endif
00463   #if defined(USART0)
00464   } else if (handle->initData.port == USART0) {
00465     handle->txPort = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART0_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00466     handle->rxPort = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART0_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00467     handle->txPin  = AF_USART0_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00468     handle->rxPin  = AF_USART0_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00469   #endif
00470   #if defined(USART1)
00471   } else if (handle->initData.port == USART1) {
00472     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART1_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00473     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART1_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00474     handle->txPin   = AF_USART1_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00475     handle->rxPin   = AF_USART1_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00476   #endif
00477   #if defined(USART2)
00478   } else if (handle->initData.port == USART2) {
00479     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART2_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00480     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART2_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00481     handle->txPin   = AF_USART2_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00482     handle->rxPin   = AF_USART2_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00483   #endif
00484   #if defined(UART0)
00485   } else if (handle->initData.port == UART0) {
00486     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART0_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00487     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART0_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00488     handle->txPin   = AF_UART0_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00489     handle->rxPin   = AF_UART0_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00490   #endif
00491   #if defined(UART1)
00492   } else if (handle->initData.port == UART1) {
00493     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART1_TX_PORT( initData->portLocationTx );
00494     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART1_RX_PORT( initData->portLocationRx );
00495     handle->txPin   = AF_UART1_TX_PIN( initData->portLocationTx );
00496     handle->rxPin   = AF_UART1_RX_PIN( initData->portLocationRx );
00497   #endif
00498   } else {
00499     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00500   }
00501 #else
00502   location = handle->initData.portLocation;
00503 
00504   if ( 0 ) {
00505   #if defined(USART0)
00506   } else if (handle->initData.port == USART0) {
00507     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART0_TX_PORT(location);
00508     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART0_RX_PORT(location);
00509     handle->txPin   = AF_USART0_TX_PIN(location);
00510     handle->rxPin   = AF_USART0_RX_PIN(location);
00511   #endif
00512   #if defined(USART1)
00513   } else if (handle->initData.port == USART1) {
00514     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART1_TX_PORT(location);
00515     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART1_RX_PORT(location);
00516     handle->txPin   = AF_USART1_TX_PIN(location);
00517     handle->rxPin   = AF_USART1_RX_PIN(location);
00518   #endif
00519   #if defined(USART2)
00520   } else if (handle->initData.port == USART2) {
00521     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART2_TX_PORT(location);
00522     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_USART2_RX_PORT(location);
00523     handle->txPin   = AF_USART2_TX_PIN(location);
00524     handle->rxPin   = AF_USART2_RX_PIN(location);
00525   #endif
00526   #if defined(UART0)
00527   } else if (handle->initData.port == UART0) {
00528     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART0_TX_PORT(location);
00529     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART0_RX_PORT(location);
00530     handle->txPin   = AF_UART0_TX_PIN(location);
00531     handle->rxPin   = AF_UART0_RX_PIN(location);
00532   #endif
00533   #if defined(UART1)
00534   } else if (handle->initData.port == UART1) {
00535     handle->txPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART1_TX_PORT(location);
00536     handle->rxPort  = (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)AF_UART1_RX_PORT(location);
00537     handle->txPin   = AF_UART1_TX_PIN(location);
00538     handle->rxPin   = AF_UART1_RX_PIN(location);
00539   #endif
00540   } else {
00541     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00542   }
00543 #endif
00544 
00545   if (enable)
00546   {
00547     GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->txPort, handle->txPin, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00548     GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->rxPort, handle->rxPin, gpioModeInput, 0);
00549     #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00550     if (handle->initData.fcType == uartdrvFlowControlHw)
00551     {
00552       GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->initData.ctsPort, handle->initData.ctsPin, gpioModeInput, 0);
00553       GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->initData.rtsPort, handle->initData.rtsPin, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00554       GPIO_IntConfig(handle->initData.ctsPort, handle->initData.ctsPin, true, true, true);
00555     }
00556     #endif
00557   }
00558   else
00559   {
00560     GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->txPort, handle->txPin, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00561     GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->rxPort, handle->rxPin, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00562     #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00563     if (handle->initData.fcType == uartdrvFlowControlHw)
00564     {
00565       GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->initData.ctsPort, handle->initData.ctsPin, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00566       GPIO_PinModeSet(handle->initData.rtsPort, handle->initData.rtsPin, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00567       GPIO_IntConfig(handle->initData.ctsPort, handle->initData.ctsPin, true, true, false);
00568     }
00569     #endif
00570   }
00571   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00572 }

00576 
00577 /***************************************************************************/
00591 Ecode_t UARTDRV_Init(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle, UARTDRV_Init_t *initData)
00592 {
00593   Ecode_t retVal;
00594   #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00595   uint32_t handleIdx;
00596   bool handleIsSet;
00597   #endif
00598   USART_InitAsync_TypeDef usartInit = USART_INITASYNC_DEFAULT;
00599 
00600 
00601   if (handle == NULL)
00602   {
00603     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00604   }
00605   if (initData == NULL)
00606   {
00607     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00608   }
00609   memset(handle, 0, sizeof(UARTDRV_HandleData_t));
00610 
00611 
00612   #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00613   // Set handler pointer in handler array
00614   if (!uartdrvHandleIsInitialized)
00615   {
00616     for (handleIdx = 0; handleIdx < EMDRV_UARTDRV_MAX_DRIVER_INSTANCES; handleIdx++)
00617     {
00618       uartdrvHandle[handleIdx] = NULL;
00619     }
00620     uartdrvHandleIsInitialized = true;
00621   }
00622 
00623   handleIsSet = false;
00624   for (handleIdx = 0; handleIdx < EMDRV_UARTDRV_MAX_DRIVER_INSTANCES; handleIdx++)
00625   {
00626     if ((uartdrvHandle[handleIdx] == NULL) || (uartdrvHandle[handleIdx] == handle))
00627     {
00628       uartdrvHandle[handleIdx] = handle;
00629       handleIsSet = true;
00630       break;
00631     }
00632   }
00633 
00634   if (!handleIsSet)
00635   {
00636     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00637   }
00638   #else
00639   // Force init data to uartdrvFlowControlNone if flow control is excluded by EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE
00640   handle->initData.fcType = uartdrvFlowControlNone;
00641   #endif
00642 
00643 
00644   // Set clocks and DMA requests according to available peripherals
00645   if (false)
00646   {
00647   #if defined(USART0)
00648   } else if (initData->port == USART0)
00649   {
00650     handle->uartClock   = cmuClock_USART0;
00651     handle->txDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART0_TXBL;
00652     handle->rxDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART0_RXDATAV;
00653   #endif
00654   #if defined(USART1)
00655   }
00656   else if (initData->port == USART1)
00657   {
00658     handle->uartClock   = cmuClock_USART1;
00659     handle->txDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART1_TXBL;
00660     handle->rxDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART1_RXDATAV;
00661   #endif
00662   #if defined(USART2)
00663   }
00664   else if (initData->port == USART2)
00665   {
00666     handle->uartClock   = cmuClock_USART2;
00667     handle->txDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART2_TXBL;
00668     handle->rxDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART2_RXDATAV;
00669   #endif
00670   #if defined(UART0)
00671   }
00672   else if (initData->port == UART0)
00673   {
00674     handle->uartClock   = cmuClock_UART0;
00675     handle->txDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_UART0_TXBL;
00676     handle->rxDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_UART0_RXDATAV;
00677   #endif
00678   #if defined(UART1)
00679   }
00680   else if (initData->port == UART1)
00681   {
00682     handle->uartClock   = cmuClock_UART1;
00683     handle->txDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_UART1_TXBL;
00684     handle->rxDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_UART1_RXDATAV;
00685   #endif
00686   #if defined(UART2)
00687   }
00688   else if (initData->port == UART2)
00689   {
00690     handle->uartClock   = cmuClock_UART2;
00691     handle->txDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_UART2_TXBL;
00692     handle->rxDmaSignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_UART2_RXDATAV;
00693   #endif
00694   }
00695   else
00696   {
00697     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00698   }
00699 
00700   memcpy((void *)&handle->initData, (const void *)initData, sizeof(UARTDRV_Init_t));
00701   handle->rxQueue = initData->rxQueue;
00702   handle->rxQueue->head = 0;
00703   handle->rxQueue->tail = 0;
00704   handle->rxQueue->used = 0;
00705   handle->rxDmaActive = false;
00706 
00707   handle->txQueue = initData->txQueue;
00708   handle->txQueue->head = 0;
00709   handle->txQueue->tail = 0;
00710   handle->txQueue->used = 0;
00711   handle->txDmaActive = false;
00712 
00713   handle->IgnoreRestrain = false;
00714 
00715   usartInit.baudrate = initData->baudRate;
00716   usartInit.stopbits = initData->stopBits;
00717   usartInit.parity = initData->parity;
00718   usartInit.oversampling = initData->oversampling;
00719 #if defined(USART_CTRL_MVDIS)
00720   usartInit.mvdis = initData->mvdis;
00721 #endif
00722 
00723   // UARTDRV is fixed at 8 bit frames.
00724   usartInit.databits = (USART_Databits_TypeDef)USART_FRAME_DATABITS_EIGHT;
00725 
00726   // Enable clocks
00727   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, true);
00728   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00729   CMU_ClockEnable(handle->uartClock, true);
00730 
00731   // Init U(S)ART to default async config.
00732   // RX/TX enable is done on demand
00733   usartInit.enable = usartDisable;
00734   USART_InitAsync(initData->port, &usartInit);
00735 
00736   #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN )
00737   initData->port->ROUTEPEN = USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN
00738                              | USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN;
00739   initData->port->ROUTELOC0 = ( initData->port->ROUTELOC0 &
00740                                 ~( _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_MASK
00741                                    | _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_MASK ) )
00742                               | ( initData->portLocationTx  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_SHIFT  )
00743                               | ( initData->portLocationRx  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_SHIFT  );
00744   #else
00745   initData->port->ROUTE = USART_ROUTE_TXPEN
00746                         | USART_ROUTE_RXPEN
00747                         | (initData->portLocation
00748                           << _USART_ROUTE_LOCATION_SHIFT);
00749   #endif
00750 
00751   if ((retVal = ConfigGPIO(handle, true)) != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
00752   {
00753     return retVal;
00754   }
00755 
00756   INT_Disable();
00757 
00758   // Configure hardware flow control pins and interrupt vectors
00759   #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00760   GPIOINT_Init();
00761   GPIOINT_CallbackRegister(initData->ctsPin, HwFcManageClearToSend);
00762   handle->fcPeerState = uartdrvFlowControlOn;
00763   handle->fcSelfState = uartdrvFlowControlOn;
00764   handle->fcSelfCfg = uartdrvFlowControlAuto;
00765   FcApplyState(handle);
00766   #endif
00767 
00768   // Clear any false IRQ/DMA request
00769   USART_IntClear(initData->port, ~0x0);
00770 
00771   // Enable TX permanently as the TX circuit consumes very little energy.
00772   // RX is enabled on demand as the RX circuit consumes some energy due to
00773   // continuous (over)sampling.
00774   USART_Enable(initData->port, usartEnableTx);
00775 
00776   // Discard false frames and/or IRQs
00777   initData->port->CMD = USART_CMD_CLEARRX | USART_CMD_CLEARTX;
00778 
00779   // Initialize DMA.
00780   DMADRV_Init();
00781 
00782   if ( DMADRV_AllocateChannel(&handle->txDmaCh,NULL) != ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK )
00783   {
00784     INT_Enable();
00785     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_DMA_ALLOC_ERROR;
00786   }
00787 
00788   if ( DMADRV_AllocateChannel(&handle->rxDmaCh,NULL) != ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK )
00789   {
00790     INT_Enable();
00791     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_DMA_ALLOC_ERROR;
00792   }
00793 
00794   INT_Enable();
00795   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00796 }
00797 
00798 
00799 /***************************************************************************/
00809 Ecode_t UARTDRV_DeInit(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00810 {
00811   if (handle == NULL)
00812   {
00813     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00814   }
00815   // Stop DMA's.
00816   DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->rxDmaCh );
00817   DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->txDmaCh );
00818 
00819   // Do not leave any peer restrained on DeInit
00820   UARTDRV_FlowControlSet(handle, uartdrvFlowControlOn);
00821 
00822   ConfigGPIO(handle, false);
00823 
00824   USART_Reset(handle->initData.port);
00825   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_RXDIS;
00826   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_TXDIS;
00827 
00828   CMU_ClockEnable(handle->uartClock, false);
00829 
00830   #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
00831   GPIOINT_CallbackRegister(handle->initData.ctsPin, NULL);
00832   #endif
00833 
00834   DMADRV_FreeChannel( handle->txDmaCh );
00835   DMADRV_FreeChannel( handle->rxDmaCh );
00836   DMADRV_DeInit();
00837 
00838   handle->rxQueue->head = 0;
00839   handle->rxQueue->tail = 0;
00840   handle->rxQueue->used = 0;
00841 
00842   handle->txQueue->head = 0;
00843   handle->txQueue->tail = 0;
00844   handle->txQueue->used = 0;
00845 
00846   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00847 }
00848 
00849 
00850 /***************************************************************************/
00862 Ecode_t UARTDRV_Abort(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle, UARTDRV_AbortType_t type)
00863 {
00864   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *rxBuffer, *txBuffer;
00865 
00866   if (handle == NULL) {
00867     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00868   }
00869 
00870   INT_Disable();
00871   if ((type == uartdrvAbortTransmit) && (handle->txQueue->used == 0))
00872   {
00873     INT_Enable();
00874     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_IDLE;
00875   }
00876   else if ((type == uartdrvAbortReceive) && (handle->rxQueue->used == 0))
00877   {
00878     INT_Enable();
00879     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_IDLE;
00880   }
00881   else if ((type == uartdrvAbortAll) && (handle->txQueue->used == 0)
00882                                      && (handle->rxQueue->used == 0))
00883   {
00884     INT_Enable();
00885     return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_IDLE;
00886   }
00887 
00888   // Stop DMA's.
00889   if ((type == uartdrvAbortTransmit) || (type == uartdrvAbortAll))
00890   {
00891     GetTailBuffer(handle->txQueue, &txBuffer);
00892     DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->txDmaCh );
00893     DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->txDmaCh,
00894                                    (int*)&txBuffer->itemsRemaining );
00895     txBuffer->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ABORTED;
00896     if (txBuffer->callback != NULL)
00897     {
00898       txBuffer->callback(handle,
00899                          ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ABORTED,
00900                          NULL,
00901                          txBuffer->itemsRemaining);
00902     }
00903   }
00904   if ((type == uartdrvAbortReceive) || (type == uartdrvAbortAll))
00905   {
00906     GetTailBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &rxBuffer);
00907     DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->rxDmaCh );
00908     DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->rxDmaCh,
00909                                    (int*)&rxBuffer->itemsRemaining );
00910     rxBuffer->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ABORTED;
00911     if (rxBuffer->callback != NULL)
00912     {
00913       rxBuffer->callback(handle,
00914                          ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_ABORTED,
00915                          NULL,
00916                          rxBuffer->itemsRemaining);
00917     }
00918   }
00919   INT_Enable();
00920 
00921   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
00922 }
00923

00925 /***************************************************************************/
00934 uint8_t UARTDRV_GetReceiveDepth(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00935 {
00936   return (uint8_t)handle->rxQueue->used;
00937 }

00940 /***************************************************************************/
00956 UARTDRV_Status_t UARTDRV_GetReceiveStatus(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
00957                                           uint8_t **buffer,
00958                                           UARTDRV_Count_t *itemsReceived,
00959                                           UARTDRV_Count_t *itemsRemaining)
00960 {
00961   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *rxBuffer;
00962   uint32_t remaining;
00963 
00964   if (handle->rxQueue->used > 0)
00965   {
00966     GetTailBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &rxBuffer);
00967     DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->rxDmaCh,
00968                                    (int*)&remaining );
00969 
00970     *itemsReceived = rxBuffer->transferCount - remaining;
00971     *itemsRemaining = remaining;
00972     *buffer = rxBuffer->data;
00973   }
00974   else
00975   {
00976     *itemsRemaining = 0;
00977     *itemsReceived = 0;
00978     *buffer = NULL;
00979   }
00980   return handle->initData.port->STATUS;
00981 }
00982

00984 /***************************************************************************/
00993 uint8_t UARTDRV_GetTransmitDepth(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
00994 {
00995   return (uint8_t)handle->txQueue->used;
00996 }

00999 /***************************************************************************/
01015 UARTDRV_Status_t UARTDRV_GetTransmitStatus(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01016                                            uint8_t **buffer,
01017                                            UARTDRV_Count_t *itemsSent,
01018                                            UARTDRV_Count_t *itemsRemaining)
01019 {
01020   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *txBuffer;
01021   uint32_t remaining;
01022 
01023   if (handle->txQueue->used > 0)
01024   {
01025     GetTailBuffer(handle->txQueue, &txBuffer);
01026     DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->txDmaCh,
01027                                    (int*)&remaining );
01028 
01029     *itemsSent = txBuffer->transferCount - remaining;
01030     *itemsRemaining = remaining;
01031     *buffer = txBuffer->data;
01032   }
01033   else
01034   {
01035     *itemsRemaining = 0;
01036     *itemsSent = 0;
01037     *buffer = NULL;
01038   }
01039   return handle->initData.port->STATUS;
01040 }

01043 /***************************************************************************/
01055 Ecode_t UARTDRV_FlowControlSet(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle, UARTDRV_FlowControlState_t state)
01056 {
01057   #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
01058   handle->fcSelfCfg = state;
01059   if (state != uartdrvFlowControlAuto)
01060   {
01061     handle->fcSelfState = state;
01062   }
01063   return FcApplyState(handle);
01064   #else
01065   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
01066   #endif
01067 }

01100 /***************************************************************************/
01109 Ecode_t UARTDRV_FlowControlIgnoreRestrain(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle)
01110 {
01111   handle->IgnoreRestrain = true;
01112 
01113   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
01114 }

01116 
01117 /***************************************************************************/
01130 UARTDRV_Count_t UARTDRV_ForceReceive(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01131                                       uint8_t *data,
01132                                       UARTDRV_Count_t maxCount)
01133 {
01134   Ecode_t retVal;
01135   uint32_t rxState;
01136   UARTDRV_Count_t i = 0;
01137 
01138   retVal = CheckParams(handle, data, maxCount);
01139   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01140   {
01141     return 0;
01142   }
01143 
01144   // Wait for DMA receive to complete and clear
01145   while(handle->rxQueue->used > 0);
01146 
01147   rxState = (handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXENS);
01148   if (!rxState)
01149   {
01150     EnableReceiver(handle);
01151   }
01152 
01153   while ((handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV))
01154   {
01155     *data = (uint8_t)handle->initData.port->RXDATA;
01156     data++;
01157     i++;
01158     if (i >= maxCount)
01159     {
01160       break;
01161     }
01162   }
01163   data -= i;
01164 
01165   if (!rxState)
01166   {
01167     DisableReceiver(handle);
01168   }
01169   return i;
01170 }
01171 
01172 
01173 /***************************************************************************/
01187 Ecode_t  UARTDRV_ForceTransmit(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01188                                uint8_t *data,
01189                                UARTDRV_Count_t count)
01190 {
01191   Ecode_t retVal;
01192   uint32_t txState;
01193 
01194   retVal = CheckParams(handle, data, count);
01195   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01196   {
01197     return retVal;
01198   }
01199 
01200   // Wait for DMA transmit to complete and clear
01201   while(handle->txQueue->used > 0);
01202 
01203   txState = (handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_TXENS);
01204   if (!txState)
01205   {
01206     EnableTransmitter(handle);
01207   }
01208 
01209   while (count--)
01210   {
01211     while (!(handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_TXBL));
01212     handle->initData.port->TXDATA = *data;
01213     data++;
01214   }
01215   while (!(handle->initData.port->STATUS & USART_STATUS_TXC));
01216 
01217   if (!txState)
01218   {
01219     DisableTransmitter(handle);
01220   }
01221 
01222   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
01223 }
01224 
01225 
01226 /***************************************************************************/
01241 Ecode_t UARTDRV_Receive(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01242                         uint8_t *data,
01243                         UARTDRV_Count_t count,
01244                         UARTDRV_Callback_t callback)
01245 {
01246   Ecode_t retVal;
01247   UARTDRV_Buffer_t outputBuffer;
01248   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *queueBuffer;
01249 
01250   retVal = CheckParams(handle, data, count);
01251   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01252   {
01253     return retVal;
01254   }
01255   outputBuffer.data = data;
01256   outputBuffer.transferCount = count;
01257   outputBuffer.itemsRemaining = count;
01258   outputBuffer.callback = callback;
01259   outputBuffer.transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_WAITING;
01260 
01261   retVal = EnqueueBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &outputBuffer, &queueBuffer);
01262   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01263   {
01264     return retVal;
01265   }
01266   if (!(handle->rxDmaActive))
01267   {
01268     EnableReceiver(handle);
01269     StartReceiveDma(handle, queueBuffer);
01270     #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
01271     handle->fcSelfState = uartdrvFlowControlOn;
01272     FcApplyState(handle);
01273     #endif
01274   } // else: started by ReceiveDmaComplete
01275 
01276   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
01277 }
01278 
01279 
01280 /***************************************************************************/
01293 Ecode_t UARTDRV_ReceiveB(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01294                    uint8_t *data,
01295                    UARTDRV_Count_t count)
01296 {
01297   Ecode_t retVal;
01298   UARTDRV_Buffer_t inputBuffer;
01299   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *queueBuffer;
01300 
01301   retVal = CheckParams(handle, data, count);
01302   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01303   {
01304     return retVal;
01305   }
01306   inputBuffer.data = data;
01307   inputBuffer.transferCount = count;
01308   inputBuffer.itemsRemaining = count;
01309   inputBuffer.callback = NULL;
01310   inputBuffer.transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_WAITING;
01311 
01312   retVal = EnqueueBuffer(handle->rxQueue, &inputBuffer, &queueBuffer);
01313   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01314   {
01315     return retVal;
01316   }
01317   while(handle->rxQueue->used > 1)
01318   {
01319     EMU_EnterEM1();
01320   }
01321   EnableReceiver(handle);
01322   #if (EMDRV_UARTDRV_HW_FLOW_CONTROL_ENABLE)
01323   handle->fcSelfState = uartdrvFlowControlOn;
01324   FcApplyState(handle);
01325   #endif
01326   StartReceiveDma(handle, queueBuffer);
01327   while(handle->rxDmaActive)
01328   {
01329     EMU_EnterEM1();
01330   }
01331   return queueBuffer->transferStatus;
01332 }
01333 
01334 
01335 /***************************************************************************/
01350 Ecode_t UARTDRV_Transmit(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01351                          uint8_t *data,
01352                          UARTDRV_Count_t count,
01353                          UARTDRV_Callback_t callback)
01354 {
01355   Ecode_t retVal;
01356   UARTDRV_Buffer_t inputBuffer;
01357   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *queueBuffer;
01358 
01359   retVal = CheckParams(handle, data, count);
01360   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01361   {
01362     return retVal;
01363   }
01364   inputBuffer.data = data;
01365   inputBuffer.transferCount = count;
01366   inputBuffer.itemsRemaining = count;
01367   inputBuffer.callback = callback;
01368   inputBuffer.transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_WAITING;
01369 
01370   retVal = EnqueueBuffer(handle->txQueue, &inputBuffer, &queueBuffer);
01371   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01372   {
01373     return retVal;
01374   }
01375   if (!(handle->txDmaActive))
01376   {
01377     StartTransmitDma(handle, queueBuffer);
01378   } // else: started by TransmitDmaComplete
01379 
01380   return ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK;
01381 }

01384 /***************************************************************************/
01397 Ecode_t UARTDRV_TransmitB(UARTDRV_Handle_t handle,
01398                           uint8_t *data,
01399                           UARTDRV_Count_t count)
01400 {
01401   Ecode_t retVal;
01402   UARTDRV_Buffer_t outputBuffer;
01403   UARTDRV_Buffer_t *queueBuffer;
01404 
01405   retVal = CheckParams(handle, data, count);
01406   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01407   {
01408     return retVal;
01409   }
01410   outputBuffer.data = data;
01411   outputBuffer.transferCount = count;
01412   outputBuffer.itemsRemaining = count;
01413   outputBuffer.callback = NULL;
01414   outputBuffer.transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_WAITING;
01415 
01416   retVal = EnqueueBuffer(handle->txQueue, &outputBuffer, &queueBuffer);
01417   if (retVal != ECODE_EMDRV_UARTDRV_OK)
01418   {
01419     return retVal;
01420   }
01421   while(handle->txQueue->used > 1)
01422   {
01423     EMU_EnterEM1();
01424   }
01425   StartTransmitDma(handle, queueBuffer);
01426   while(handle->txDmaActive)
01427   {
01428     EMU_EnterEM1();
01429   }
01430   return queueBuffer->transferStatus;
01431 }
